duties_responsibilities.duty: Call on practicing physicians, hospitals, clinics, and other health-related organizations within an assigned territory to provide the most current information on Indivior products and their approved indications.
Create and maintain a positive impression with customers, while maintaining timely communication with the Area Sales Manager and other members of the sales leadership team.
Develop and maintain an up-to-date business plan that evaluates sales effectiveness and ensures achievement of sales objectives.
Represent Indivior at national and/or local conferences, if applicable, and perform special projects and assignments as directed by the Sales Leadership team.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA degree required 1+ years of pharmaceutical/medical/healthcare or related experience
